prompt: Line graph showing fructan levels throughout the day. X-axis shows time: Morgens, Mittag, Abends. Y-axis shows level: niedrig to hoch. The curve starts LOW in the morning, rises to a first peak around midday, dips slightly, then rises to the HIGHEST peak in the evening. Include small sun icon near Mittag and grass icon somewhere.

Checklist format with hand-drawn checkboxes. Title: Anweiden-Checkliste. Items with empty checkbox squares: Wetter gecheckt, Grashöhe geprüft, Weidezeit begrenzt, Pferd beobachtet. Make it look like a to-do list on paper.
Simple 2x2 grid showing temperature vs fructan risk. Cold + Sunny = HIGH RISK (draw warning). Warm + Cloudy = LOW RISK (draw checkmark). Use simple weather icons (sun, cloud, thermometer).
